This includes using the stand-alone architecture of Spring Boot without containers and XML files, using Spring Boot starters for integration with other Spring and 3rd Party libraries and frameworks, and using data sources and REST services. Earners can successfully apply Springboot concepts into working code within the MarketAxess environment.
7f844e73-2a32-4f0b-8cbb-4f599ba30449.name: Springboot (Silver)

badge_template_activities.title: Defined curriculum in MarketAxess Developer track.
The earner has successfully demonstrated proficiency by successfully achieving a score of 'Intermediate' in the Pluralsight Springboot SkillIQ assessment.
Springboot (Bronze)

a8182595-2278-4edf-bf32-b5431b3be11b.description: Earners of the Swing (Bronze) badge can demonstrate the foundational skills needed for Swing development and use of Swing widgets. This includes successfully setting up a desktop program and effectively leveraging the architecture to divide applications into separate, easily-maintainable modules that can communicate with each other. Earners can successfully apply database concepts into working code within the MarketAxess environment.
a8182595-2278-4edf-bf32-b5431b3be11b.name: Swing (Bronze)

badge_template_activities.title: Defined curriculum in MarketAxess Developer track.
Proven demonstration of skills within the MarketAxess environment as validated by internal review committee.

94da4b69-993b-4876-912d-9627717562c0.description: Earners of the Swing (Gold) badge can demonstrate the advanced skills needed for Swing development and advanced interfaces. This includes multi-threading, JTree, progress bars and custom table editors and renderers. Earners can successfully apply Swing concepts into working code within the MarketAxess environment.
94da4b69-993b-4876-912d-9627717562c0.name: Swing (Gold)

badge_template_activities.title: Defined curriculum in MarketAxess Developer track.
Proven demonstration of skills within the MarketAxess environment as validated by internal review committee.
Swing (Silver)

8b8e3fbe-8df9-4fd9-a94f-bb6490188ce8.description: Earners of the Swing (Silver) badge can demonstrate the mid-level skills needed for Swing development. This includes implementing a model-view-controller architecture, connecting a database using JDBC, transferring data, and use of serialization to save objects to files and how to use preferences to save small amounts of data. Earners can successfully apply Swing concepts into working code within the MarketAxess environment.
8b8e3fbe-8df9-4fd9-a94f-bb6490188ce8.name: Swing (Silver)

badge_template_activities.title: Defined curriculum in MarketAxess Developer track.

99249ef3-5fa8-4fa6-bce5-af49c7e23efb.description: Earners of the Unit Testing (Bronze) badge have developed the foundational skills needed for successful unit testing in a Java environment. This includes testing code maintainability, using common unit test patterns, and applying legacy code testing patterns. Earners can successfully apply Unit Testing concepts to working code within the MarketAxess environment.
99249ef3-5fa8-4fa6-bce5-af49c7e23efb.name: Unit Testing (Bronze)

badge_template_activities.title: Defined curriculum in MarketAxess Developer track.
The earner has successfully demonstrated proficiency by successfully achieving a score of 'Novice' in the Plurasight SQL Skills assessment.

342ac0d6-67e8-4bcb-9742-6c37cadade04.description: Earners of the Unit Testing (Gold) badge have developed the foundational skills needed for successful unit testing in a Java environment. This includes applying various advanced techniques for making unit tests more robust and easier to maintain, making Arrange and Assert parts of your tests easier to read and maintain, and how to model unit tests to match the System Under Test. Earners can successfully apply Unit Testing concepts to working code within the MarketAxess environment.
342ac0d6-67e8-4bcb-9742-6c37cadade04.name: Unit Testing (Gold)

badge_template_activities.title: Defined curriculum in MarketAxess Developer track.

Unit Testing (Silver)

76455f61-2683-4840-a70f-5b98c7cc1216.description: Earners of the Unit Testing (Silver) badge have developed the foundational skills needed for successful unit testing in a Java environment. This includes identifying what makes a test valuable, the use of mocks, and integration testing and unit testing anti-patterns. Earners can successfully apply Unit Testing concepts to working code within the MarketAxess environment.
76455f61-2683-4840-a70f-5b98c7cc1216.name: Unit Testing (Silver)

b27aa82d-898c-4367-9ddd-ca74ef60533c.description: Earners of the Websockets (Bronze) badge have developed the foundational skills needed to effectively use Websockets in a dynamic environment. This includes building real-time web applications and using HTML5 WebSockets to create unique web apps that leverage enhanced browser capabilities. Earners can successfully apply Websockets concepts into working code within the MarketAxess environment.
b27aa82d-898c-4367-9ddd-ca74ef60533c.name: WebSockets (Bronze)

3f90a08f-2be9-4810-aa4b-ce22373d218d.description: Earners of the Websockets (Silver) badge have developed the foundational skills needed to effectively use Websockets in a dynamic environment. This includes using the Java API for Web Sockets to provide communication between the client and a Java based server as well as deserializing messages into Java types. Earners can successfully apply Websockets concepts into working code within the MarketAxess environment.
